review: Been using this chromecast for a few weeks now. Very easy to set up and use, slightly difficult to find instructions on how to swap wifi networks but still easy once you find them. No issues to report, shipping on time. The chromecast only supports a limited number of file types, so you may have trouble streaming from sites where you don't "purchase" the content, if you know what i mean.
author: tom

review: Been using it very frequently for HBO GO and Netflix. It really has served its purpose well. I just wish there were more apps associated with (i.e. Amazon video or iTunes). Also makes it difficult to use in hotels these days since the majority of hotels now ask you to "login" when the browser first starts to initiate their Wi-Fi. With Chromecast, there's no real way to do that unfortunately.
